appSlider.title: Full integration with E-commerce website provider
appSlider.description: Your app will be connected with your WooCommerce, Magento and Opencart website so you can easily manage products and sale.

features.title: Multi Language Support
features.description: Your app can be read by any person in the world who speaks different languages, different reading directions.

features.title: Secure Payment Integration
features.description: Supports multi payment gateway (work with 99% of payment services).

features.title: Push Notification
features.description: Ensuring connection between your stores and your customers, Fluxstore provides “push notification” function which will alert your consumers any new information from your store’s promotions.
